CustomField.formula: AND( Associated_Opportunity_Type__c = 'Revenue Opportunity', OR( CONTAINS( Owner:User.UserRole.Name, 'Director' ), CONTAINS( Owner:User.UserRole.Name, 'ISD' ) ), OR( CONTAINS( Owner:User.UserRole.Name, 'COR' ), CONTAINS( Owner:User.UserRole.Name, 'SEL' ), CONTAINS( Owner:User.UserRole.Name, 'STR' ) ) ) && FireDiscountApprovals__c = TRUE
CustomField.label: Entry Criteria Met for IntFinDiscENTDIR.
